hero_insights.title: The Only Metric That Matters
hero_insights.subtitle: More rounds = 2x better outcomes
hero_insights.insight: Companies that secure 4+ funding rounds have 2x higher acquisition rates than those with only one round. This is the most robust finding in the dataset.
hero_insights.implication: Focus interventions on helping companies COMPLETE rounds, not just raising more capital per round.

hero_insights.title: Capital Doesn't Fix This
hero_insights.subtitle: 300x more money = 4% better
hero_insights.insight: Once you cross a minimum threshold (~$300K), founder quality matters exponentially more than funding size. This challenges the 'spray capital' model.
hero_insights.implication: Focus on founder selection and matching, not capital availability.

hero_insights.title: The Graduation Gap
hero_insights.subtitle: Dutch Seed→A lags peers
hero_insights.insight: Dutch startups have lower Seed→Series A conversion than European peers. Sample sizes are small (n=97) but the pattern is consistent.
hero_insights.implication: The intervention point isn't Series A capital. It's the 12-24 months after seed where companies stall.

hero_insights.title: Speed Isn't Your Problem
hero_insights.subtitle: Dutch pace matches global
hero_insights.insight: Dutch startups raise at competitive velocity. The ~2 month gap is not a structural disadvantage. The problem isn't speed—it's completion.
hero_insights.implication: Don't invest in 'accelerating' fundraising. Invest in helping more companies COMPLETE rounds.

exploratory_insights.title: City Patterns (Low Confidence)
exploratory_insights.why_it_matters: Interesting pattern but n=8 is too small for conclusions. Needs Dealroom validation with larger sample.

exploratory_insights.title: 2008 Crisis Impact
exploratory_insights.why_it_matters: Dutch ecosystem appears more vulnerable to macro shocks, but sample is borderline.

exploratory_insights.title: Funding Concentration
exploratory_insights.why_it_matters: Headline numbers are misleading. The median Dutch company raised $0.74M.

exploratory_insights.title: Sector Concentration Risk
exploratory_insights.why_it_matters: Ecosystem may be too dependent on specific sectors. Downturn in biotech or payments would hit hard.

exploratory_insights.title: The Zombie Problem
exploratory_insights.why_it_matters: Real success rate is lower than numbers suggest. Many companies surviving but not thriving.
